alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 11:54PM EDT until April 01 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL DEFIANCE AND NORTH CENTRAL PAULDING COUNTIES... At 1154 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hicksville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Defiance. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN <50 MPH
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
